subject: Football
Social Media
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Victor Cruz called out the Giants’ co-owners, John Mara and Steve Tisch, to participate in the social media craze and douse themselves to raise awareness of Lou Gehrig’s disease.
snippet: Victor Cruz called out the Giants’ co-owners, John Mara and Steve Tisch, to participate in the social media craze and douse themselves to raise awareness of Lou Gehrig’s disease.
